	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

::Cerberus::

    His trip so far had been uneventful. He had seen not much=
 and had not enjoyed it. As he neared the Iron Fist. (Is that on mainland o=
r on the island now?) he slowed down. Why was he helping Magmatron? Because=
 he would kill him? But Magmatron wasn't even around here, he couldn't stop=
 him. A sudden jolt of energon shot through him. He fell to his knees.
    =
"Slag it!" He shouted. Then he started to walk towards the Iron Fist again.=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
  Sent: Thursday, November 23, 2000 9:37 AM
  Subject: Re: Message to Zar=
dus/Shuttle Arrives


  ::Magmatron/Cerberus::

      Magmatron recived the=
 reply from Zardus. He awoke Cerberus and sent him to the Alliance base. Ma=
gmatron told him to make sure he wasn't detected by any one else.

      Ce=
rberus on his way was wondering why they needed an alliance with these bots=
. They were plenty powerful by themselves, if only he were able to lead.
  =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Yanshosh@... 
    To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, November 22, 2000 5:04 PM
    Subject: Re=
: Message to Zardus/Shuttle Arrives


    ::Repressor/Zardus::

    Repress=
or sighs, listening to the two as the shuttle flies into the 
    docking b=
ay of the Iron Fist.

    "We're here," he says to Zardus over the comm, wh=
ere do you want us 
    to go?"
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  =
  Zardus smiles as he recieves Magmatron's transmission, activating his 
  =
  comm for a reply.

    "Your offer is very acceptable," 'Lord' Zardus rep=
lies to 'Emperor' 
    Magmatron, "Very acceptable indeed. I welcome this n=
ew alliance, 
    Empereror Magmatron. You may send Cerebrus, I will tell t=
he defences 
    to let him through."

    He sets off toward the Iron Fist=
, switching his comm-link to 
    Repressor's frequency.

    "Take her to =
Conference Room A, I shall be there shortly."

    The Alliance leader ente=
rs the Iron Fist, walking off toward the 
    conference room.
    ~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    Repressor stands up, the shuttle's hatch op=
ening. The docking bay 
    closes, leaving the artificial light to fill th=
e area.

    "Let's go," he says, "Zardus wants us in Conference Room A."

=

          eGroups Sponsor
